text: John Lawrence Schroeder (born November 12, 1945) is an American professional golfer. He played on the PGA Tour and Champions Tour. Schroeder was born in Great Barrington, Massachusetts, the son of tennis great Ted Schroeder. He studied at the University of Michigan and was a member of the golf team, an All-American in 1968. He turned pro in 1969. == References == Category:Living people Category:1945 births Category:Sportspeople from California Category:American golfers
title: John Schroeder (golfer)
